channel.title: KTVZ - NewsChannel 21 | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/KTVZ21/

item.title: Very cold this morning! We'll warm up to the 70s today, just
item.description: Very cold this morning! We'll warm up to the 70s today, just a couple degrees below normal. Lows tonight will be a bit chilly again. Then, we have a big heat up heading into the holiday weekend. Happy Wednesday! #ktvzweather

item.title: The U.S. Department of Transportation on Tuesday awarded mor
item.description: The U.S. Department of Transportation on Tuesday awarded more than $102 million in federal funding to Oregon, California and Washington to install electric vehicle charging stations and hydrogen fueling stations for trucks along Interstate 5 and other key freight routes.

item.title: Forest Service delays release of draft environmental impact
item.description: Forest Service delays release of draft environmental impact statement for NW Forest Plan amendment/update to October.
